metadata.feature_description: Create, edit, and manage activity stream posts with various content types and privacy settings

steps.action: Navigate to Activity Feed page
steps.expected: Activity Feed page loads with post editor visible
steps.actual: Activity Feed page loaded successfully with 'Tell the world something...' editor

steps.action: Click on post editor and enter text 'Test text-only post - January 16, 2026'
steps.expected: Text appears in the editor
steps.actual: Text was entered successfully in the contenteditable area

steps.action: Click Share button to submit post
steps.expected: Post appears in the activity stream
steps.actual: Post was created and displayed in the feed with correct content

steps.action: Click on post editor to activate it
steps.expected: Editor becomes active with toolbar visible
steps.actual: Editor activated with emoji picker icon visible in toolbar

steps.action: Use emoji picker to insert grinning face emoji and add text
steps.expected: Emoji and text appear in editor
steps.actual: Emoji was inserted via emoji picker, text added successfully

steps.action: Click Share button to submit post
steps.expected: Post with emoji appears in activity stream
steps.actual: Post created with emoji displaying correctly as grinning face

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Create post with different privacy levels

steps.action: Click on post editor and locate privacy/visibility controls
steps.expected: Privacy dropdown or selector becomes available
steps.actual: Editor activated, toolbar with privacy icon (eye icon) visible

steps.action: Click on privacy icon to reveal privacy options
steps.expected: Privacy options dropdown appears
steps.actual: Privacy dropdown appeared with options: Everyone, Community, Friends, Private

steps.action: Select 'Friends' privacy level and enter post text
steps.expected: Friends privacy is selected, text entered
steps.actual: Friends option selected, text 'Privacy test post - Friends only' entered

steps.action: Click Share to create Friends-only post
steps.expected: Post is created with Friends privacy level
steps.actual: Post created successfully with Friends-only visibility

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Create post with maximum character limit

steps.action: Enter exactly 250 characters (default max limit per code)
steps.expected: 250 characters are accepted
steps.actual: 250 characters (repeated 'A') were accepted and posted

steps.action: Submit post with 250 characters
steps.expected: Post is created with all 250 characters
steps.actual: Post created successfully showing all 250 characters

steps.action: Test over-limit: Enter 300 characters
steps.expected: Either rejected or truncated at limit
steps.actual: 300 characters were accepted - no client-side validation enforced

issues: Character limit (250 default) is not enforced client-side. Posts exceeding the limit are accepted without validation or truncation.

steps.action: Enter text containing script tag: 'Test HTML sanitization bold'
steps.expected: Script tags should be stripped, safe HTML may be preserved
steps.actual: Text was entered in the editor

steps.action: Submit post and verify sanitization
steps.expected: Script tag removed, safe content displayed
steps.actual: Script tag was completely stripped. Post shows 'Test HTML sanitization bold' - safe text preserved, malicious script removed

steps.action: Enter post with special characters: & < > " ' @ # $ % ^ * () [] {} | \ / ~ ` + = - _ ; : , . ? ! and symbols
steps.expected: All special characters are handled correctly
steps.actual: All special characters were entered and displayed correctly including copyright, registered, trademark symbols

steps.action: Locate an existing post and look for Edit option
steps.expected: Edit option should be available in post actions
steps.actual: No Edit option found. Post actions only include: Like, Comment, Unsubscribe, Remove, Pin

issues: Edit functionality does not exist in the Activity Stream module. Code review confirmed no Update/Edit method in ActivityStreamServicesController.cs. Only Create, Delete, SoftDelete, and TogglePin methods exist.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Create post with empty content (edge case)

steps.action: Open post editor without entering any text
steps.expected: Share button should be disabled or validation should prevent submission
steps.actual: Editor opened with empty content, Share button appeared clickable

steps.action: Click Share button with empty content
steps.expected: System should prevent empty post creation
steps.actual: Empty post was created and appeared in the feed with no content

issues: BUG: System allows creation of empty posts. No validation prevents submitting posts with no content. Share button is not disabled when editor is empty.

steps.action: Click Remove link on a post
steps.expected: Confirmation dialog should appear
steps.actual: Confirmation dialog appeared with message 'Are you sure you want to delete this item?' and Yes/No buttons

steps.action: Click Yes to confirm deletion
steps.expected: Post should be removed from the feed
steps.actual: Post was successfully deleted and removed from the activity stream

observations: Edit functionality does not exist in the Activity Stream module - code review of ActivityStreamServicesController.cs confirms only Create, Delete, SoftDelete, and TogglePin methods are implemented. No Update/Edit API exists.
Character limit (250 characters default) is configurable but not enforced client-side. Posts exceeding the limit are accepted.
Privacy levels available: Everyone (E), Community (C), Friends (F), Private/User (U), Role/Group (R)
HTML sanitization uses FilterMaliciousTags function which strips script tags and other potentially dangerous HTML
Emoji support is provided via emojione library with an emoji picker in the toolbar
Posts display author as 'Anonymous' when viewing own posts - this appears to be expected behavior for the SuperUser account
